summary: This bill, the Expanding Access to Diabetes Self-Management Training Act of 2025, aims to improve access to diabetes outpatient self-management training services under Medicare. It modifies existing regulations regarding service specifications and cost-sharing, and mandates the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation (CMI) to test providing virtual diabetes self-management training services. The goal is to improve health outcomes, reduce hospitalizations, and evaluate the effectiveness of virtual training programs.
